StringTable.Creator: Mesh Terrain Creator
StringTable.LegacyCreator_Description: Create mesh-terrain(s) support 2/3/4/5 layer textures, based on a terrain shader using 2/3/4/5 separated textures.
StringTable.Warning_VertexCountTooBig_AssetPreferred: Vertex count is too big. It is recommended to use .asset file format to significantly reduce the time of saving and importing a mesh.
StringTable.TextureArrayBasedCreator_Description: Create a mesh-terrain support 2 to 12 layers, based on a terrain shader using 2 texture arrays.
StringTable.UnityTerrainToMTEMesh_Description: Convert a terrain to a MTE-editable mesh.
StringTable.MeshToMTEMesh_Description: Convert a regular mesh to a MTE-editable mesh.
StringTable.Name: Name
StringTable.Info_KeepMeshVertex: Converted mesh will use the original vertices' position.
StringTable.Info_NotKeepMeshVertex: Converted mesh will use uniformly layout-ed vertex positions, whose height sampled from the mesh.
StringTable.Info_KeepMeshUV: Converted mesh will use original uv.
StringTable.Info_NotKeepMeshUV: Converted mesh will use uniformly layout-ed uv.
StringTable.Info_KeepMeshNormal: Converted mesh will use original normal. Obj format hasn't been supported yet. Note: please turn off *settings -> Recalculate normals when saving mesh to* so as to keep original mesh normals when the mesh is saved later.
StringTable.Info_NotKeepMeshNormal: Converted mesh will use smoothed normal.
StringTable.Warning_OutputDirContainsNameFolder: The Output directory already contains a folder of the same name. Use another name or choose another output directory instead.
StringTable.Info_TerrainConverter_MeshOnly: Terrain will be converted to regular mesh with default material. Splat layers will Not be preserved after conversion.
StringTable.Info_TerrainConverter_NotMeshOnly: Terrain will be converted to mesh-terrain with material using MTE's shader. Splat layers will be preserved after conversion.
StringTable.Tooltip_KeepLightmapping: "Keep lightmapping data" is not compatible with "Split" and "File Format *.obj."
StringTable.Error_ControlTextureResolutionIsNotAMult: The control texture resolution is not a multiple of split number (number of copies). Please give a number that is divisible by control texture size.
StringTable.Warning_SelectedGameObjectNoMeshFilter: Selected GameObject has no MeshFilter component.
StringTable.Warning_SelectedGameObjectNoMesh: The MeshFilter on selected GameObject has no Mesh.
StringTable.Warning_SelectedGameObjectNoMeshCollider: Selected GameObject has no MeshCollider component.
StringTable.Info_DisabledMTEWhenCameraSelected: MTE editor is temporarily disabled because the camera is selected.
StringTable.Warning_CannotFindMeshTerrain: Cannot find a mesh-terrain that matches current layer and tag. Please make sure the mesh-terrains you want to edit have the same layer and tag as MTE editor. Then click the refresh-filter button.
StringTable.Warning_TargetScaled: Target {0} is scaled: the actual painting region might be different from the region covered by the brush. Please reset its scale to (1,1,1).
StringTable.Error_NoEditorLoaded: No editor is loaded, which is likely caused by compile errors of your project's code. Please fix them first, otherwise MTE will not work normally.
StringTable.Info_MakeSureOnlyMeshTerrainsPassedTheFi: Please make sure only those mesh-terrains you want to edit passed the filter.
StringTable.RaiseLower_Description: Click to raise/lower. Press space to toggle up/down.
StringTable.Wrapper_Description: Select a collider and click Wrap.
StringTable.SplatPainter_Description: Select a texture below, then click/drag to paint.
StringTable.SplatPainter_Mode_SelectedDescription: Paint on a selected mesh-terrain with custom UV, ignore the filter.
StringTable.SplatPainter_Mode_FilteredDescription: Paint on all mesh-terrains that match the tag and layer of the filter
StringTable.Info_SplatPainter_NoSplatTextureFound: No splat textures found in targets.
StringTable.Info_SplatPainter_NoSplatTextureFoundOnS: No splat textures found in selected GameObject
StringTable.PaintVertexColor_Description: Select a color below, then click to paint.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_VertexColorFill: Fill all targets with the selected color.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_AttachVertexColor: Attach vertex color component to selected GameObject.
StringTable.PaintGrass_Description: Click and drag to paint. Hold Shift to erase. Press PageUp/Down to undo/redo.
StringTable.Warning_NoGrassLoader: Please create a grass loader object first. (Refer to the docs for details.)
StringTable.Info_HowToRotate: Hold Ctrl and roll the scroll wheel to rotate.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_SaveLightMapData: Save lightmap data to loaded grasses.asset.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_CreateGrassLoader: Create grass loader object in the scene. One scene can have only one single GrassLoader object.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_AttachGrassLoader: Attach GrassLoader component to selected GameObject. Or fix the GrassLoader on it.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_BakePointCloudToMes: Convert the painted grass point cloud to actual meshes. You will not be able to modify the point cloud after baking.
StringTable.Warning_NoGrassLoader_CannotBakePointClo: Cannot bake grass point cloud to mesh: no GrassLoader component found in scene.
StringTable.Info_RemoveGrassLoader: Remove the GrassLoader component? The point cloud data will be retained in the asset file.
StringTable.Warning_TooManyPoints: Too many points will be created, which will make the editor freeze for a while. Please decrease the brush size or increase the distance between points.
StringTable.Info_GrassDistance: The minimum distance between two grasses.
StringTable.Info_PaintOneGrass: When the brush is too small or the distance is too far, only one grass will be painted.
StringTable.Warning_HowToSaveASceneWithGrasses: Please use button No.4 to save your scene, otherwise the preview-only grasses will be saved into your scene.unity file!
StringTable.Info_GrassStatic: All grass instances are static and will be considered when baking lightmap.
StringTable.ObjectPainter_Description: Click and drag to paint. Hold Shift to erase. Press PageUp/PageDown to undo/redo.
StringTable.Info_BrushMappingType_NormalizedInMeshBo: Brush covered region is calculated by normalizing brush rectangle against the mesh's bounding box: recommended for square mesh-terrain with UV calculated by MTE creator/converter.
StringTable.Info_BrushMappingType_ExtendedFromHitPoi: Brush covered region is calculated by extending brush size from mouse point: recommended for mesh with custom UV and non-square mesh.
StringTable.Info_ModeDescription_Fixed: Hold ctrl and scroll to adjust direction.
StringTable.Info_ModeDescription_Movement: Normalized flow speed and direction is determined by mouse movement.
StringTable.Info_ModeDescription_Pinch: Press Space to toggle between pinching and inflating.
StringTable.Info_ModeDescription_Vortex: Press Space to toggle direction of rotation.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_CreateFlowMap: Create a flow-map using current direction.
StringTable.MeshMisc_Description: Press Enter to begin moving. Hold shift to erase selection. Press Esc to reselect.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_DeleteVertices: Delete selected vertices. Vertex-colored GameObjects will be ignored.
StringTable.Warning_CannotCutHolesOnAVertexColoredMe: You cannot cut holes on a vertex-colored mesh-terrain.
StringTable.Info_SwapQuadSplitDirection: Press S to modify the split direction of the highlighted quad under the mouse.
StringTable.Info_MeshToolBox_Snap: Press button to snap height of selected vertices.
StringTable.TextureArrayPainter_Description: Select a texture below, then click/drag to paint.
StringTable.Info_TextureArrayPainter_NoSplatTextureF: No splat texture-array found in selected GameObject.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_CreateTextureArrayS: Create a TextureArray settings asset to create texture arrays.
StringTable.Info_AlbedoAndSmoothness: Albedo(RGB) & Smoothness(A) texture, which is readonly and only this one is used for rendering. Click the refresh button to generate from Albedo and Smoothness texture.
StringTable.Info_AlbedoTexturePropertyName: Albedo texture, only used to generate the Albedo(RGB) & Smoothness(A) texture, not for rendering.
StringTable.Info_SmoothnessTexturePropertyName: Smoothness texture, only used to generate the Albedo(RGB) & Smoothness(A) texture, not for rendering.
StringTable.Tooltip_CannotModifySmoothnessTextureTex: Cannot modify smoothness texture state for a mesh-terrain block. Use the UI on tile container/root object instead.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_Snapshooter: Capture a screenshot of a mesh-terrain from a top-down perspective.
StringTable.Info_Snapshooter_DisableLighting: Ignore all lighting in scene and use flat white ambient color. Lightmap applied to the mesh-terrain will also be disabled.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_MeshTillingBaker: Bake unified tilling into mesh's uv0. Be sure to backup your mesh first! Specialized shader is required to properly render the baked mesh. If you don't know the detail, don't use this.
StringTable.MeshToTerrainConverter_Description: Convert a mesh-terrain to a Unity3D terrain.
StringTable.UVEditor_Description: Normalize uv of a mesh; Invert u or v of a mesh.
StringTable.PivotEditor_Description: Offset the pivot point of a mesh.
StringTable.MeshZUpToYUpConverter_Description: Convert a z-up mesh to y-up by rotating -90 degrees around z axis.
StringTable.MeshSaver_Description: Save a single mesh of any format as an obj, asset or fbx file.
StringTable.ControlTextureCreator_Description: Create control texture(s). Created texture(s) will be saved to Assets/.
StringTable.TextureAdjuster_Description: Create an adjusted copy of a texture. Adjusted texture will be saved to Assets/. Useful when you need to resize or flip a control texture (SplatAlpha).
StringTable.TextureChannelPacker_Description: Pack texture channels into one single texture.
StringTable.PBRTextureArraySettings_Description_Colo: All layers' color texture will be combined into one TextureArray.
All layers' color texture will be combined into one TextureArray; All layers' normal textures will be combined into another TextureArray.
StringTable.PBRTextureArraySettings_Description_PBR: Each layer's Albedo textures will be combined into 1st texture array. Each layer's roughness, normal and AO texture will be merged into one RoughnessNormalAO texture: R is roughness, GB is packed normal, and A is AO. Those RoughnessNormalAO textures will be combined into 2nd TextureArray.
StringTable.PBRTextureArraySettings_Description_PBRM: Each layer's albedo and metallic textures will be combined into 1st texture array: RGB is Albedo, A is Metallic. Each layer's roughness, normal, AO texture will be merged into one RoughnessNormalAO texture: R is roughness, GB is packed normal, and A is AO. Those RoughnessNormalAO textures will be combined into 2nd TextureArray.
StringTable.Tooltip_TextureArrayMode: Texture Array Mode determines what kind of textures are packed in. Use one that matches the shader.
StringTable.Tooltip_TextureModeColorAndNormal: Only use base-color (diffuse) and normal map.
StringTable.Tooltip_TextureModePBR: Use PBR maps including albedo, normal, roughness and AO.
StringTable.Tooltip_TextureModePBRMetallic: Use PBR maps including albedo, metallic, normal, roughness and AO.
StringTable.Info_ColorOrColorNormalTextureArrayLimit: When using Color or ColorNormal texture array, only builtin render pipeline are supported. And only Auto and Custom shader type are supported.
StringTable.Info_UseSmoothness: When smoothness texture is supported by shader, use smoothness texture in result material if mask-map is assigned in terrain-layer's mask-map. Smoothness = 1.0 - Roughness.
StringTable.Info_UseRoughness: When roughness texture is supported by shader, use roughness texture in result material if mask-map is assigned in terrain-layer's mask-map. Roughness = 1.0 - Smoothness.
StringTable.Info_BreakMaskMap: The mask-map of each terrain-layer will be extracted into separated textures, which can be use latter in a mesh-terrain's material.
StringTable.Tooltip_AdjustControlMap: Modify the size of this control map; flip it vertically or/and horizontally
StringTable.Info_AutoSaveMeshImmediately: Modified mesh-terrain(s) will be automatically saved when mouse is released. If the editor becomes noticeably laggy, please disable *Auto Save Mesh*. Note undo/redo is disabled when auto-save is enabled.
StringTable.Info_AutoSaveMeshWithInterval: Modified mesh-terrain(s) will be automatically saved every (Interval) minutes. Note undo/redo will be unreliable when auto-save is enabled.
StringTable.Info_UseTheSaveButtonToSaveMesh: You must save the mesh by clicking the Save button below! Ctrl+S WON'T work!
StringTable.Info_SelectAGameObjectWithValidMesh: Please select a GameObject with a valid mesh.
StringTable.Info_PleaseSelectAGameObjectWithTerrain: Please select a GameObject with a valid Terrain.
StringTable.Info_LimitOfTexture5: When using MTE/XXX/5 Textures/XXXX/Fog, the layer5 shares Tilling and Offset with the layer4.
StringTable.Info_HotkeyTable:
F1~F9 Select a tool
[ ] Adjust brush size. - + Adjust brush speed/strength/flow.
PageUp Undo (Fn+Up on Mac) PageDown Redo (Fn+Down on Mac)
~ Toggle selection wireframe/outline.
* Hotkey is only available when 1. The IME is off. 2. The editor or scene view has the focus.
StringTable.Info_WillBeSavedInstantly: Your modification will be saved automatically.
StringTable.Info_SliderModeHint: Right click to switch slider mode: regular or logarithmic.
StringTable.Info_RefreshAlbedoAndSmoothnessTexturesO: Will re-generate albedo&smoothness textures according to first block's material, and assign them to all blocks.
StringTable.Info_ActivationNotApplied: Mesh Terrain Editor Pro hasn't been activated on this machine.
StringTable.Info_ActivationApplied: Mesh Terrain Editor Pro has been activated on this machine.
StringTable.Info_HowToRemoteDeactivate: If you have a valid MTE Pro copy running on another machine, you can deactivate it and activate the copy on this machine instead.
StringTable.Info_ReadyForRemoteDeactivation: This machine is ready for remote deactivation.
StringTable.Info_FreeVersion_UsingSplatTexturesExcep: Only 4 different textures can be used in MTE Free. Please assign 4 different textures and uses a 4 Textures shader in the material.
StringTable.Info_FreeVersion_UsingTextureArrayExcept: Only 4 layers can be used in MTE Free. Please use 4 layer texture arrays.
StringTable.Info_FreeVersion_UsingPrefabMoreThan2IsA: Only first 2 prefabs can be used in MTE Free.
StringTable.Info_FreeVersion_UsingGrassMoreThan1IsAP: Only first grass can be used in MTE Free.
StringTable.Info_FreeVersion_EditMoreThan2MeshTerrai: Only 2 mesh-terrains can be edited at the same time in MTE Free.
StringTable.AlreadyLatestRelease: Mesh Terrain Editor is up to date.
StringTable.NewReleaseAvailable: New release of Mesh Terrain Editor is available.
StringTable.DocumentationDescription: Describes how to use Mesh Terrain Editor.
StringTable.ForumDescription: Exchange ideas and views on Mesh Terrain Editor.
StringTable.InstantMessagingDescription: Chat on Discord for issues and ideas on Mesh Terrain Editor.
StringTable.EmailDescription: Please read the docs first. If it didn't help, email us.
StringTable.FeatureRequestAndBugReportDescription: Request new features or suggest modifications to existing features.
StringTable.VideoDescription: Introduction video for Mesh Terrain Editor.
StringTable.Warning_Confirm_UnrecoverableOperation: Are you sure? This operation cannot be undone.
StringTable.Warning_ConfirmReplaceControlTexture: Are you sure you want to replace the control texture?
StringTable.Warning_MeshIsNotSaved:
Do you want to save the changes you made on the mesh-terrain?
You can save it later but your changes will be lost if you close Unity without saving it.
StringTable.Warning_PleaseSelectAPathInsideAssets: Please select a path inside the "Assets" directory
StringTable.Warning_TextureCountNotSupported: Selected terrain layer number should be 2/3/4/5. Please remove or add terrain layers. If you want to use more than 5 layers, select Use TextureArray which supports 2 to 12 layers.
StringTable.Warning_TextureCountNotSupportedForTextu: Selected terrain layer number should be 2 to 12. Please remove or add layers.
StringTable.Warning_GrassLoaderExists: Cannot create a new GrassLoader object: an existing GrassLoader has been added to GameObject {0}.
StringTable.Warning_CannotAttachGrassLoaderToAGameOb: Cannot attach GrassLoader to a GameObject with MeshFilter.
StringTable.Warning_FbxNotSupported: FBX is not supported. To enable FBX, enable the built in FBX exporter in settings or install FBX Exporter in the package manager.
StringTable.Warning_ShaderIsExperimental: This shader is experimental or unstable and is subject to change in a future release. Don't use it unless you know what you're doing.
StringTable.Warning_ASENotFound: Cannot find Amplify Shader Editor, features based on ASE might be disabled. Please upgrade ASE to latest version and restart Unity.
StringTable.Warning_ShaderTypeNotMatchTheRenderPipel: The shader type doesn't match current render pipeline. This will make the mesh terrain rendered incorrectly.
StringTable.Warning_ShaderNotProvided: This kind of shader hasn't been provided.
StringTable.Warning_InvalidObjectName: Object name is invalid. It should not be empty or all whitespace. It should not contain any of \ / : * ? " < > |
StringTable.Warning_TextureTypeShouldBeNormalMap: Texture should be of Texture Type *Normal map*. Please make sure it is *Normal map* in the texture import settings inspector.
StringTable.Warning_CannotUseObjAndKeepLightmappingA: Saving a mesh in obj file format but trying to keep lightmapping data. uv2 cannot be saved in obj file, thus lightmapping will have no effect.
StringTable.Error_NameIsInvalid: Name is invalid. It cannot be null or empty.
StringTable.Error_OutputDirIsInvalid: OutPutDir is invalid. It cannot be null or empty.
StringTable.Error_OutputDirNotInAssetsFormat: OutPutDir<{0}> is not a path inside project /Assets.
StringTable.Error_VertexCountNotInSupportedRangeForm: VertexCountAlongAnEdge should be a number within the range of {0}-{1}
StringTable.Error_TerrainTextureSourceFileImageSizeF: Terrain<{0}> Layer[{1}]<{2}> {3} <{4}>'s source image file is located at <{5}>. It's size is not {6}.
StringTable.Error_ShaderNotSupported: This shader is not supported on target platform!
StringTable.Error_MTEFilesDuplicated: Some file of MTE is duplicated, which will cause undefined behavior or unexpected error.Please make sure only one Latest copy of Mesh Terrain Editor are imported in you project.Please delete duplicated files or files from old version first before importing MTE package.
StringTable.Error_CannotMergeTexturesOfDifferentSize: Cannot merge textures of different size
StringTable.Error_MissingLayerTextures: Some texture is not assigned to texture layers
StringTable.Error_CannotSplitAndKeepLightmappingAtOn: Cannot split and keep lightmapping at the same time.
StringTable.Info_InvoiceNumberHint: The invoice number can be found in two places. 1. The attached PDF file of the purchase confirmation email sent from Unity asset store in 48 hours after purchase. If you still have not received your invoice after 48 hours has passed, please contact Unity Customer Service. 2. Open https://assetstore.unity.com/orders, find the order for *Mesh Terrain Editor Pro*, and the invoice number is in the *Invoice Number* column.
StringTable.Activation_Description: Activate MTE Pro with invoice/serial number.
StringTable.ActivateHint: Activate MTE Pro using the invoice/serial number. (require Internet access)
StringTable.DeactivateHint: Deactivate MTE Pro on this machine, you can then reactivate it on another machine. MTE will revert to MTE Free on this machine. (require Internet access)
StringTable.ManualActivateHint: Activate MTE Pro manually for machines without direct access to the Internet.
StringTable.Warning_ActivationFailed: Activation failed: the invoice/serial is not valid or doesn't match this computer. Please check your invoice/serial and try again.
StringTable.Info_ActivationSucceeded: Mesh Terrain Editor Pro Activated! Please restart Unity.
StringTable.Info_ActivationHelp: The activation/deactivation might take up to 2 minutes to finish.If you need help, please refer to the documentation by clicking the question mark on the top-right of this window.If it doesn't help, join discord channel https://discord.gg/dQqp8B6 and send private message to the author.Or contact zwcloud@hotmail.com with your invoice number, which is not recommended since it may be slow to respond.
StringTable.ManualActivationHint1: Make sure your invoice/serial is valid. Then open the link on a machine that has Internet access. You will get an activation code that only works for this machine.
